title: Baked eggs with spicy black lentils

ingredients.item: 400g can Geo Organic Black Beluga Lentils
2 British Blacktail Large Free Range Eggs

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ºC, gas mark 6. Cook the broccoli stalks in boiling water for 2 minutes, then add the florets and cook for another minute. Drain.

Heat the oil in a flameproof casserole or shallow pan and gently fry the onions for 7-8 minutes until softened and lightly browned. Add the garlic, cumin, chilli and turmeric and cook for another 2 minutes. Stir in the lentils, broccoli, buttermilk and coriander, then cook gently for 2 minutes.
Make two dips in the mixture and break an egg into each. Bake in the oven for 12-15 minutes or until the eggs are lightly set.
